ygData.subject: Re: Travelling to Lower Guk to get a Guise
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The greater ice bones could see through the invis to undead cast by my L35 cleric friend.  Dunno if they can see through if it s cast by a higher level
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 8 Oct 1999, Miriana wrote:
> > From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
> >
> > Would I have time to run back to the zone border if attacked
> > while looting?
>
> Probably not. If you're attacked while looting, you'll have to
> train back through 14 undead frog spawns, 5 greater iced bones, and 1
> vampire bat (which is the one non-undead spawns you're forced to deal with
> on the way from the upper guk zone line to the assassin spawn).

The greater ice bones could see through the invis to undead
cast by my L35 cleric friend. Dunno if they can see through
if it's cast by a higher level person.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
